TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventInstance extends System.Object

summary.span: Represents language-neutral information for an event log entry.

span.span: Represents language-neutral information for an event log entry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用寫入事件記錄檔項目使用的資源識別項，而不是字串值。Use to write an event log entry with a resource identifier rather than a string value. 若要寫入事件記錄檔項目，初始化屬性，並傳遞要的執行個體方法。To write an event log entry, initialize the property and pass the instance to the method. 事件檢視器會尋找並顯示目前的語言設定為基礎的當地語系化的資源檔中的對應字串中使用的執行個體識別碼。The Event Viewer uses the instance identifier to find and display the corresponding string from the localized resource file based on current language settings. 您必須先使用資源識別項寫入事件，以對應的資源檔註冊事件來源。You must register the event source with the corresponding resource file before you write events using resource identifiers. 當寫入事件時，您可以設定屬性來指定圖示，事件檢視器顯示的項目。When writing events, you can set the property to specify the icon that the Event Viewer displays for the entry. 您也可以指定屬性來指定 事件檢視器顯示之項目的類別目錄。You can also specify a property to specify the category that the Event Viewer displays for the entry. 事件檢視器會使用要寫入的事件來源的篩選事件的類別目錄。The Event Viewer uses the category to filter events written by an event source. 事件檢視器可以顯示類別目錄做為數值，或它可以使用 「 類別目錄做為資源識別項若要顯示的當地語系化類別目錄字串。The Event Viewer can display the category as a numeric value, or it can use the category as a resource identifier to display a localized category string. 若要顯示事件檢視器中的當地語系化類別目錄字串，您必須使用事件來源類別資源檔案後，設定和設定類別資源檔案中的資源識別項。To display localized category strings in the Event Viewer, you must use an event source configured with a category resource file, and set the to a resource identifier in the category resource file. 如果事件來源沒有已設定的類別資源檔案，或指定索引類別資源檔案，然後按一下 事件檢視器中的字串是否顯示該項目的數值分類值。If the event source does not have a configured category resource file, or the specified does not index a string in the category resource file, and then the Event Viewer displays the numeric category value for that entry. 設定類別資源檔案，以及在資源檔中，類別目錄字串數目使用或類別。Configure the category resource file, along with the number of category strings in the resource file, using the or the class. 您必須先使用註冊事件記錄檔的來源要寫入的事件，該方法。You must register a source for an event log before using to write an event with the method. 來源必須設定當地語系化的項目寫入記錄檔和來源必須定義至少一個訊息資源檔。The source must be configured for writing localized entries to the log and the source must define at least a message resource file. 在您的應用程式的安裝期間建立新的事件來源。Create the new event source during the installation of your application. 這可讓作業系統重新整理其已註冊的事件來源的清單和其設定的時間。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configurations. 如果作業系統不重新整理其事件來源的清單，而且您嘗試寫入的事件，該新的來源寫入作業將會失敗。If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail. 您可以設定新的來源使用，或使用方法。You can configure a new source using an , or using the method. 您必須建立新的事件來源電腦上具有系統管理權限。You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source. 定義事件訊息及建置事件記錄檔資源檔的相關詳細資訊，請參閱 「 訊息編譯器 」 中的主題 Platform SDK 文件，網址為[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com)。For details about defining event messages and building event log resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例寫入資訊事件項目，並再重複使用寫入至現有的事件記錄檔的警告事件的一個項目。The following code example writes an informational event entry, and then reuses the to write an entry for a warning event to an existing event log. 事件訊息文字會指定訊息資源檔中使用的資源識別項。The event message text is specified using a resource identifier in a message resource file. 程式碼範例假設已註冊的來源對應的訊息資源檔。The code example assumes that the corresponding message resource file has been registered for the source. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#9)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#9)] 程式碼範例會使用下列的訊息文字檔案，內建資源程式庫 EventLogMsgs.dll。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 訊息文字檔案是建立訊息資源檔的來源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 訊息文字檔案定義的資源識別碼和類別目錄、 事件訊息和參數插入字串的文字。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using language-neutral information to define an event log entry.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using language-neutral information to define an event log entry.

param.name: categoryId
param.span: A resource identifier that corresponds to a string defined in the category resource file of the event source, or zero to specify no category for the event.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified resource identifiers for the localized message and category text of the event entry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要將參考的項目寫入事件記錄檔，初始化並將它傳遞給方法。To write an informational entry to an event log, initialize an and pass it to the method. 設定`instanceId`事件訊息中對應的資源識別項來源的屬性。Set the `instanceId` to the resource identifier of the event message in the corresponding property for the source. 設定`categoryId`的數值分類值，或事件類別目錄中的資源識別元來源的屬性; 設定`categoryId`為零的任何事件類別目錄。Set the `categoryId` to a numeric category value, or the resource identifier of the event category in the property for the source; set the `categoryId` to zero for no event category. 的新執行個體的屬性設定為預設。The property for the new instance is set to by default. 事件檢視器使用的資源識別碼，來顯示來源的當地語系化的資源檔中的對應字串。The Event Viewer uses the resource identifiers to display the corresponding strings from the localized resource files for the source. 您可以撰寫使用資源識別項的事件之前，您必須註冊來源的相對應的資源檔。You must register the source with the corresponding resource files before you can write events using resource identifiers. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例寫入資訊事件項目，並再重複使用寫入至現有的事件記錄檔的警告事件的一個項目。The following code example writes an informational event entry, and then reuses the to write an entry for a warning event to an existing event log. 事件訊息文字會指定訊息資源檔中使用的資源識別項。The event message text is specified using a resource identifier in a message resource file. 程式碼範例假設已註冊的來源對應的訊息資源檔。The code example assumes that the corresponding message resource file has been registered for the source. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#9)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#9)] 程式碼範例會使用下列的訊息文字檔案，內建資源程式庫 EventLogMsgs.dll。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 訊息文字檔案是建立訊息資源檔的來源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 訊息文字檔案定義的資源識別碼和類別目錄、 事件訊息和參數插入字串的文字。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified resource identifiers for the localized message and category text of the event entry and the specified event log entry type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要將項目寫入事件記錄檔中，初始化並將它傳遞給方法。To write an entry to an event log, initialize an and pass it to the method. 設定`instanceId`事件訊息中對應的資源識別項來源的屬性。Set the `instanceId` to the resource identifier of the event message in the corresponding property for the source. 設定`categoryId`的數值分類值，或事件類別目錄中的資源識別元來源的屬性; 設定`categoryId`為零的任何事件類別目錄。Set the `categoryId` to a numeric category value, or the resource identifier of the event category in the property for the source; set the `categoryId` to zero for no event category. 事件檢視器使用的資源識別碼，來顯示來源的當地語系化的資源檔中的對應字串。The Event Viewer uses the resource identifiers to display the corresponding strings from the localized resource files for the source. 您可以撰寫使用資源識別項的事件之前，您必須註冊來源的相對應的資源檔。You must register the source with the corresponding resource files before you can write events using resource identifiers. 設定`entryType`其中一種預先定義的項目類型。Set the `entryType` to one of the pre-defined entry types. 事件檢視器會使用事件類型來決定要在事件記錄檔的清單檢視中顯示的圖示。The Event Viewer uses the event type to determine which icon to display in the list view of the event log. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會寫入兩個稽核事件記錄檔的事件項目`myNewLog`。The following code example writes two audit event entries to the event log `myNewLog`. 如果它們尚不存在本機電腦上的程式碼範例會建立新的事件來源和新的事件記錄檔。The code example creates a new event source and a new event log if they do not exist on the local computer. 事件訊息文字會指定資源檔中使用的資源識別項。The event message text is specified using a resource identifier in a resource file. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#7)] 程式碼範例會使用下列的訊息文字檔案，內建資源程式庫 EventLogMsgs.dll。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 訊息文字檔案是建立訊息資源檔的來源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 訊息文字檔案定義的資源識別碼和類別目錄、 事件訊息和參數插入字串的文字。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

MemberSignature.Value: public int CategoryId { get; set; }
.property instance int32 CategoryId
Public Property CategoryId As Integer
public: property int CategoryId { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.CategoryId : int with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the resource identifier that specifies the application-defined category of the event entry.

span.span: Gets or sets the resource identifier that specifies the application-defined category of the event entry.

value.span: Numeric 類別目錄值或資源識別碼對應到事件來源的類別資源檔案中定義的字串。

span.span: A numeric category value or resource identifier that corresponds to a string defined in the category resource file of the event source.

value.span: 預設為零，表示沒有類別，將顯示事件項目。

span.span: The default is zero, which signifies that no category will be displayed for the event entry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件記錄檔分類是應用程式定義的值，用來幫助篩選事件，或提供進一步的事件的相關資訊。Event log categories are application-defined values that help filter events, or provide further information about the event. 例如，您的應用程式可以定義不同的類別，不同的元件或不同的作業。For example, your application can define separate categories for different components or different operations. 設定屬性來指定 事件檢視器顯示之項目的類別目錄。Set the property to specify the category that the Event Viewer displays for the entry. 事件檢視器可以顯示類別目錄做為數值，或是使用做為資源識別項若要顯示的當地語系化類別目錄字串會根據目前的語言設定。The Event Viewer can display the category as a numeric value, or it can use the as a resource identifier to display a localized category string based on the current language settings. 若要顯示事件檢視器中的當地語系化類別目錄字串，您必須使用事件來源類別資源檔案後，設定和設定類別資源檔案中的資源識別項。To display localized category strings in the Event Viewer, you must use an event source configured with a category resource file, and set the to a resource identifier in the category resource file. 如果事件來源沒有已設定的類別資源檔案，或指定索引類別資源檔案，然後按一下 事件檢視器中的字串是否顯示該項目的數值分類值。If the event source does not have a configured category resource file, or the specified does not index a string in the category resource file, and then the Event Viewer displays the numeric category value for that entry. 寫入事件類別目錄使用資源識別項之前，必須與對應的資源檔登錄來源。You must register the source with the corresponding resource file before you write event categories using resource identifiers. 設定類別資源檔案，以及在資源檔中，類別目錄字串數目使用或類別。Configure the category resource file, along with the number of category strings in the resource file, using the or the class. 當資源檔中定義類別目錄字串，必須連續 1 開始，最多設定編號類別資源識別元屬性值。When defining category strings in a resource file, the category resource identifiers must be numbered consecutively starting at 1, up to the configured property value. 事件類別目錄是選擇性的。Event categories are optional. 如果您的應用程式不會使用類別，請勿設定事件記錄檔項目。If your application does not use categories, do not set the for the event log entry. 定義事件訊息及建置事件資源檔的相關詳細資訊，請參閱 「 訊息編譯器 」 中的主題 Platform SDK 文件，網址為[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/). 如需在資源檔中定義的事件類別目錄的詳細資訊，請參閱 Platform SDK 中的 「 事件類別目錄 」 主題For details about defining event categories in resource files, see the "Event Categories" topic in the Platform SDK ## Examples 下列程式碼範例寫入資訊事件項目，並再重複使用寫入至現有的事件記錄檔的警告事件的一個項目。The following code example writes an informational event entry, and then reuses the to write an entry for a warning event to an existing event log. 事件訊息文字會指定訊息資源檔中使用的資源識別項。The event message text is specified using a resource identifier in a message resource file. 程式碼範例假設已註冊的來源對應的訊息資源檔。The code example assumes that the corresponding message resource file has been registered for the source. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#9)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#9)] 程式碼範例會使用下列的訊息文字檔案，內建資源程式庫 EventLogMsgs.dll。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 訊息文字檔案是建立訊息資源檔的來源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 訊息文字檔案定義的資源識別碼和類別目錄、 事件訊息和參數插入字串的文字。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

exception.span: The property is set to a negative value or to a value larger than .

span.span: The property is set to a negative value or to a value larger than .

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType EntryType { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType EntryType
Public Property EntryType As EventLogEntryType
public: property System::Diagnostics::EventLogEntryType EntryType { System::Diagnostics::EventLogEntryType get(); void set(System::Diagnostics::EventLogEntryType value); };
member this.EntryType : System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the event type of the event log entry.

span.span: Gets or sets the event type of the event log entry.
An value that indicates the event entry type.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個事件是單一型別，表示應用程式時報告事件。Each event is of a single type, which the application indicates when it reports the event. 事件檢視器會使用事件類型來決定要在事件記錄檔的清單檢視中顯示的圖示。The Event Viewer uses the event type to determine which icon to display in the list view of the event log. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例寫入資訊事件項目，並再重複使用寫入至現有的事件記錄檔的警告事件的一個項目。The following code example writes an informational event entry, and then reuses the to write an entry for a warning event to an existing event log. 事件訊息文字會指定訊息資源檔中使用的資源識別項。The event message text is specified using a resource identifier in a message resource file. 程式碼範例假設已註冊的來源對應的訊息資源檔。The code example assumes that the corresponding message resource file has been registered for the source. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#9)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#9)] 程式碼範例會使用下列的訊息文字檔案，內建資源程式庫 EventLogMsgs.dll。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 訊息文字檔案是建立訊息資源檔的來源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 訊息文字檔案定義的資源識別碼和類別目錄、 事件訊息和參數插入字串的文字。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

.property instance int64 InstanceId

member this.InstanceId : int64 with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the resource identifier that designates the message text of the event entry.

span.span: Gets or sets the resource identifier that designates the message text of the event entry.

value.span: 資源識別項對應至事件來源的訊息資源檔中定義的字串。

span.span: A resource identifier that corresponds to a string defined in the message resource file of the event source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可唯一識別已設定的事件來源的事件項目。The property uniquely identifies an event entry for a configured event source. 訊息資源檔中定義的事件對應到從郵件定義欄位中的訊息文字檔案編譯的資源識別碼。For events defined in message resource files, the corresponds to the resource identifier compiled from the message definition fields in the message text file. 您的應用程式可以藉由設定寫入當地語系化的事件記錄項目資源識別項。Your application can write localized event log entries by setting the to a resource identifier. 事件檢視器會使用資源識別碼來尋找並顯示當地語系化的資源檔中的對應字串取決於目前的語言設定。The Event Viewer uses the resource identifier to find and display the corresponding string from the localized resource file based on current language settings. 您必須先使用資源識別項寫入事件，以對應的資源檔註冊來源。You must register the source with the corresponding resource file before you write events using resource identifiers. 定義事件訊息及建置事件記錄檔資源檔的相關詳細資訊，請參閱 「 訊息編譯器 」 中的主題 Platform SDK 文件，網址為[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。For details about defining event messages and building event log resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/). 如需有關事件記錄檔識別碼的詳細資訊，請參閱 Platform SDK 中的 < 事件識別碼 > 主題。For details about event log identifiers, see the "Event Identifiers" topic in the Platform SDK. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例寫入資訊事件項目，並再重複使用寫入至現有的事件記錄檔的警告事件的一個項目。The following code example writes an informational event entry, and then reuses the to write an entry for a warning event to an existing event log. 事件訊息文字會指定訊息資源檔中使用的資源識別項。The event message text is specified using a resource identifier in a message resource file. 程式碼範例假設已註冊的來源對應的訊息資源檔。The code example assumes that the corresponding message resource file has been registered for the source. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#9)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#9)] 程式碼範例會使用下列的訊息文字檔案，內建資源程式庫 EventLogMsgs.dll。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 訊息文字檔案是建立訊息資源檔的來源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 訊息文字檔案定義的資源識別碼和類別目錄、 事件訊息和參數插入字串的文字。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```
